modName: The Legend of Zelda - Giants Knife and Biggorons Sword
summary: Adds the Giant's Knife to Fallowstone Cave and allows you to reforge it into the Biggoron's Sword.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40615]Included in Relics of Hyrule[/url]

"They say that Biggoron's Sword is super sharp and will never break."
- Gossip Stone


The story goes that the giants that take residence in Fallowstone Cave carry with them an ancient broken sword that somehow has retained the colors on its hilt. Why they carry it is unknown, but perhaps they wish to someday reforge it when they have the expertise.



The Giant's Knife can be found in a chest in Fallowstone Cave, which can be found during the Cursed Tribe quest for the Orcs of Largashbur. The chest requires that you go to Chillwind Depths to retrieve the key which was stolen by Falmer.

It can be used as a dagger and tempered, but its true strength comes when you go to the Skyforge with
1 corundum ingot
3 Giant's Steel ingots (found in various Falmer hives)
3 leather strips
Dwarven Oil
Orcish Smithing Perk
Bladesman 2 OR Deep Wounds 2
(The logic being that you have to know how to use a sword to wield this thing that may be bigger than you)
You can find it in the Steel Category, and again, it can only be crafted at the Skyforge.

There is also an alternate version available that features a shorter path to the Knife, but with the added requirement of the Advanced Armors perk.


[youtube]sIfYvPkOqvo[/youtube]

Forging the sword:
[youtube]QB4eWRmNkJQ[/youtube]

This magnificent sword was originally made by
Mesh by Christian of early CCRE for his Zelda Oot Equipment mod:
http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/31976/?


And was converted to Skyrim by DMagnus:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1384273/?
author: JKalenad and DMagnus
